plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location for accurate visit verification and EVV compliance.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location in the background during active visits for EVV compliance.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location while using the app for visit verification.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to capture photos for visit verification and documentation.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Care Commons needs your location for accurate visit verification and EVV compliance.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Care Commons needs your location to verify you are at the client's address during clock-in and clock-out.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Care Commons needs background location access during active visits for EVV compliance and continuous verification.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Care Commons needs camera access to capture photos for visit verification and documentation.
